overview: She gives great phone. She has a mouthpiece that won’t quit. And when she finally meets you in person, rest assured you bell will ring. Meet Julianne James, at her most confident. Her most sensual. And heading a cast of the smoothest operators in the business. Including beautiful Debbie Diamond, sultry Raven Richards and fiery Mandy Wine. Say Something Nasty if you like to listen, you’ll love to watch
title: Say Something Nasty
